name: NINJA SIDE 2D (A platform jump n shoot game)
name_original: NINJA SIDE 2D (A platform jump n shoot game)
description:
Bounce on enemies, smash blocks with your head, explore caves and cliffs, and be a ninja hero in this platformer shooter game. Perfect for players who love platforming games on the console. Reach the goal in each level, find keys, battle huge enemies, take on bosses in epic boss fights, unlock powers, and get rich by collecting coins and gems. This is awesome platforming adventure goodness at its best.

FEATURES
- Battle huge spiders, killer bees, massive flies, and fight in epic boss battles.
- Lots of levels and worlds to play through.
- Extra weapons and abilities to unlock.
- Collect coins in every level and use them in the shop.
- Discover gems, keys, and other treasures.
- Super easy and addictive game play with great physics.

Download it now for free and enjoy hours of fun :)
